scripts.prepare: git clone https://github.com/SteamDatabase/Protobufs protobufs && git clone --filter=blob:none --no-checkout https://github.com/SteamRE/SteamKit steam_kit && cd steam_kit && git sparse-checkout set --cone && git checkout master && git sparse-checkout set Resources/ProtobufGen Resources/SteamLanguage && mv Resources/ProtobufGen ../protobuf_gen && mv Resources/SteamLanguage ../steam_language && cd .. && rm -rf steam_kit
